@isuperman11

1. Extract files from RAR
2. Run install.bat
3. Run game from your desktop
4. Put in your nickname
5. Leave login fields blank
6. Click play offline

works for W7 right click on 'my computer' click on 'Advanced system settings' then 'environment variable...' under 'system variables', find 'path' and click edit and change it to 'c:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin' or whatever place u have saved the java into.

Thanks cube. I got the two batch files working but I'm still getting a black screen after play online on the launcher.

"How to make a server?"

To start server, be sure you have java class path installed correctly (thanks cubeguyx). After this just launch another of the bat files inside server folder.

"How to join a server?"

Start game normally, enter your nick in the first dialog. In login screen just leave blank and click 'play offline'. After this go to multiplayer and type in cracked server's ip. If you cannot join server, most likely your or hosting person's ports are not forwarded correctly. It's also suggested to check your firewall settings. More info at portforward dot com.

If you are the host, you can join your own game by connecting to 127.0.0.1.
